sources.title: Carry On Cruising
sources.description: A sea captain about to set sail discovers that his regular shipmates have all defected. In their place are an inexperienced and over-eager bunch who wreak havoc during a Mediterranean cruise, sailing a tricky course through a sea of double entendres, until they finally reach a port in Spain.

metadata.Plot: Captain Crowther's lot is not a happy one! Five of his crew have to be replaced and at such short notice before the voyage begins there isn't much to choose from. Not only does he get the five most incompetent shipmates ever to sail the seven seas, but the passengers turn out to be a rather strange bunch too. The SS Happy Wanderer will never be the same.
metadata.Actors: Sidney James, Kenneth Williams, Kenneth Connor
